$interpreted: Dan Shan: Here we are. The others'll be here with your companion any minute now. If their car hasn't disintegrated along the way, that is.
Nolva: What?! D-disintegrated...
Dan Shan: I'm kidding, I'm kidding. Jeez, lighten up a little.
Grumbling Employee: You're a real cad, Boss, leaving us to haul the lunatic around while you take this lovely gal out for a spin!
Dan Shan: Bwahaha, it wasn't as relaxing as you'd expect. Where're the others?
Dan Shan: Hey, bro, hey! Keep your arms and legs inside 'till the car comes to a halt, you understand?
Hugo: —You, leave Nolva Carpenter with me.
Dan Shan: Hey buddy, don't get the wrong end of the stick. I ain't kidnapped anyone here.
Dan Shan: Didn't you guys explain the situation to him?
Grumbling Employee: Are you kidding? We've been over it so many times, and still he just doesn't listen.
Nolva: Don't worry, Hugo... Mr. Dang Shan's here to escort us!
Hugo: I know. I'm not a fool.
Dan Shan: Then what've you got your knickers in a twist for?
Hugo: —I have seen evil. Nobody takes Nolva Carpenter without my permission.
Nolva: Err...
Dan Shan: Bwahaha, get a load of this guy...
Dan Shan: Listen, buddy. This is our carriage, and while you're in it, you'd better be on your best behavior. It ain't polite to order others about in their own home.
Dan Shan: What happens after we get to our destination is all your business. Before then—just let us do our jobs, got it?
Hugo: You're telling me I have to do as you say until this journey's over?
Dan Shan: Bingo, I'm the one in charge here. I'm the expert, and you're my responsibilty, capiche?
Hugo: ...Such idiocy.
Hugo: That's no concern of mine.
Dan Shan: Oooh, so you wanna play tough now, huh? Okay, okay. I guess words ain't gonna cut the ice. Nobody, but nobody, flashes steel at Dan Shan's Carriage Co. without feeling the consequences.
Hugo: Haven't you dullards learned your lesson yet?
Grumbling Employee: Win or lose, we'll go on fighting together—that's the true meaning of brotherhood!
Hugo: ...I don't understand.
Dan Shan: (Haha, who the hell is this tough guy... He can't be for real, can he?)
Nolva: Uhh, I have a question...
Hugo: Step aside.
Dan Shan: Yeah, lady. The wheels won't stop for you.
Nolva: But, but...
Nolva: I don't get it, Hugo. Why can't I go with anyone else? Is that really so evil?
Dan Shan: ...What? She asked you straight, and you still don't understand?
Nolva: Don't you see?
Hugo: It's evil... because...
Hugo: I simply knew there was something to be punished just now...
Hugo: But now that you ask, I don't know... why it's evil...
Dan Shan: Huh? You don't know? Are you serious right now? Which planet do you two even come from?
Nolva: Yeah, I really don't get it...
Hugo: ...So this is the Flying Carriage professionalism of which you speak? It's truly unfathomable.
Dan Shan: ......
Dan Shan: ......
Dan Shan: ...Hey... Suddenly I'm not in the mood for a fight anymore... And by the looks of it we're being chased after. Let's take a breather, okay?
Hugo: ...All right.
Dan Shan: Hop in, lady.
Dylan: ...I've read the letters. It looks indeed as if the Twelve Noble Houses are plotting to welcome Theodore back...
Naya: Unbelievable! Only a few years ago they were always complaining about Theodore being too powerful, and now they say Angelia's too weak for them?
Angelia: It doesn't matter who sits upon the throne. The Nobles will always be plotting and pulling strings.
Angelia: That's just the relationship they've always had with the Carlos royal family... and I was too late to realize it.
Naya: Angelia...
Dylan: Where is Adelaide Serafin?
Angelia: I've allowed her temporary refuge in the palace. I'd fear for her safety were she to return home now.
Dylan: Do you truly believe she would sell out her father and her House, Your Majesty?
Angelia: ......
Angelia: I can't be sure either way.
Angelia: But I've had these letters evaluated by experts, and it's been proven that they're in the hand of the House leaders.
Dylan: So at the very least, there is a conspiracy at work...
Angelia: Exactly...
Dylan: In that case, we don't have much time left. We must get you out of the city before there's any trouble, Your Highness.
Angelia: You'd have me leave the royal city?
Dylan: We can't summon a loyal army in such a short period of time. If we try to fight them here in the royal city we're sure to be routed.
Naya: What about General Lucien? The Bears? Can we turn to them for help?
Dylan: They've all been dispatched to the frontlines to hold off the monsters. If we send for them now, I fear we may succeed only in betraying our position to the Nobles...
Dylan: But we may have a better choice close by.
Naya: Who?
Dylan: The House of Aldric.
Angelia: ...Ace?
Dylan: Yes. Ace is staying at his House's estate. You could go there with the excuse of visiting to express your condolences, Your Highness.
Angelia: But Ace is...
Dylan: It'll only be temporary, to buy us enough time to investigate and plan our response... I believe the Head of House Aldric will understand.
Angelia: Very well. Let us go to the House of Aldric.
Dylan: It would raise suspicions if I were to escort Your Highness personally. Perhaps we should make our way their separately...

The Nobles will always be plotting and pulling strings.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's just the relationship they've always had with the Carlos royal family... and I was too late to realize it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Angelia...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Where is Adelaide Serafin?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I've allowed her temporary refuge in the palace. I'd fear for her safety were she to return home now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_004","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Do you truly believe she would sell out her father and her House, Your Majesty?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_19_005","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I can't be sure either way.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But I've had these letters evaluated by experts, and it's been proven that they're in the hand of the House leaders.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So at the very least, there is a conspiracy at work...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Exactly...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"In that case, we don't have much time left. We must get you out of the city before there's any trouble, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You'd have me leave the royal city?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We can't summon a loyal army in such a short period of time. If we try to fight them here in the royal city we're sure to be routed.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_005","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What about General Lucien? The Bears? Can we turn to them for help?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_21_006","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"They've all been dispatched to the frontlines to hold off the monsters. If we send for them now, I fear we may succeed only in betraying our position to the Nobles...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But we may have a better choice close by.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The House of Aldric.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Ace?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes. Ace is staying at his House's estate. You could go there with the excuse of visiting to express your condolences, Your Highness.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But Ace is...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_23_003","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It'll only be temporary, to buy us enough time to investigate and plan our response... I believe the Head of House Aldric will understand.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Very well. Let us go to the House of Aldric.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_409_003_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Dylan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0022","IconName":"h0022s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It would raise suspicions if I were to escort Your Highness personally. Perhaps we should make our way their separately...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
